statements: UPDATE user_interactions SET message = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_interactions SET response_time = 10, interaction_date = '2021-08-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_interactions SET response_time = 10, message = 'Updated message' WHERE user_id = 123 AND chatbot_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET message = 'New message', interaction_date = '2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 789 AND response_time = 5;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_message = 'Hello, how can I help you?' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_stats SET total_interactions = 100, average_response_time = 30 WHERE chatbot_id = 2;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_message = 'Hello World' WHERE user_id = 123 AND chatbot_id = 456;
UPDATE chatbot_stats SET total_interactions = total_interactions + 1, average_response_time = 10 WHERE chatbot_id = 789;
UPDATE user_interactions SET message = 'Hello World' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE chatbot_sessions SET chatbot_id = '987e6543-a21b-32d1-d654-098765431210', end_timestamp = '2023-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE session_id = '456e7892-d34c-56e7-d890-123456789012';
UPDATE user_interactions SET response = 'Goodbye!' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE chatbot_sessions SET user_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-5678-90abcedf1234' WHERE session_id = '11112222-3333-4444-5555-666677778888';
UPDATE User_Interactions SET message = 'Hello, how can I assist you today?' WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Chatbot SET description = 'AI-powered virtual assistant' WHERE chatbot_id = '01234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE User_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'click', message = 'Clicked on the button' WHERE user_id = 'c7e20c92-2041-4d66-8074-1779e6671161';
UPDATE Chatbot SET description = 'Improved chatbot functionality', chatbot_name = 'Advanced Chatbot' WHERE chatbot_id = '70e8246a-16b5-4b13-a544-0ea1d16e7f70';
UPDATE chatbot_users SET user_name = 'Alice' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_conversations SET start_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00', end_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE convo_id = 100;
UPDATE chatbot_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', last_interaction = NOW() WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET message_text = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE convo_id = 101 AND sender = 'Bot';
